mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agent ( agent_name, agent_sex, agent_tel, agent_email, agent_profile, agent_registertime, agent_account, agent_password) VALUES (#{agentName},#{agentSex},#{agentTel},#{agentEmail},#{agentProfile},#{agentRegistertime},#{agentAccount},#{agentPassword})
mapper.update: UPDATE agent SET agent_name=#{agentName}, agent_sex=#{agentSex}, agent_registertime=#{agentRegistertime}, agent_leavetime=#{agentLeavetime}, agent_tel = #{agentTel}, agent_email = #{agentEmail}, agent_account = #{agentAccount}, agent_password = #{agentPassword}, agent_profile = #{agentProfile} WHERE agent_id = #{agentId}
